channel.title: Xiaomi 12 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Xiaomi 12 Lite MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.12.0.ULIMIXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 12 Lite Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 12 Lite Global

Codename: taoyao

Version: OS1.0.12.0.ULIMIXM | 14.0

Size: 7.2 GB

MD5: abf943726520e0db8b1eadb469b6ca58

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: New startup animation strategy makes apps launch faster
Updated the security patch to November 2024. Increased system security.
[Notes]
Fix: Multiple search bars appeared when opening Tasks from a widget
Fix: Notifications about successfully created tasks didn't disappear after being tapped
[Clock]
Fix: When setting alarm repetition, the checkbox was displayed abnormally when switching to Dark mode

Download: Here
